title: Orange panna cotta with mint roasted rhubarb
description: Creamy panna cotta infused with vanilla and orange and served with sweet, tangy rhubarb. A delicious dinner party dessert that can be prepared in advance.
ingredients: 2 blood oranges, juice and rind reserved
2 gelatine leaves, soaked in water for a few minutes until soft
2 large sprigs fresh mint, leaves picked and torn
